speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Wow, this is so cool, you guys. The entire city is blacked out!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Mom says it's all of Manhattan, parts of Brooklyn and Queens, and they have no idea when it's coming back on.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Wow, you guys, this is big.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Pants and a sweater? Why, mom? Who am I gonna meet in a blackout? Power company guys? Eligible looters? Could we talk about this later? OK.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Can I borrow the phone? I want to call my apartment and check on my grandma. What's my number?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Well, I never call me.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Oh my God, it's that Victoria's Secret model. Something... something Goodacre.

speaker: ['Jill Goodacre']
transcript: Hi Mom, it's Jill.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: She's right, it's Jill. Jill Goodacre. Oh my God. I am trapped in an ATM vestibule with Jill Goodacre! Is it a vestibule? Maybe it's an atrium. Oh, yeah, that is the part to focus on, you idiot!

speaker: ['Jill Goodacre']
transcript: Yeah, I'm fine. I'm just stuck at the bank, in an ATM vestibule.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Jill says vestibule... I'm going with vestibule.

speaker: ['Jill Goodacre']
transcript: I'm fine. No, I'm not alone... I don't know, some guy.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Oh! Some guy. Some guy. 'Hey Jill, I saw you with some guy last night. Yes, he was some guy.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Hi everyone.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: And officiating at tonight's blackout, is Rabbi Tribbiani.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Well, Chandler's old roomate was Jewish, and these are the only candles we have, so... Happy Chanukah, everyone.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Eww, look. Ugly Naked Guy lit a bunch of candles.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: That had to hurt!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Alright, alright, alright. It's been fourteen and a half minutes and you still have not said one word. Oh God, do something. Just make contact, smile!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: There you go!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: You're definitely scaring here.

speaker: ['Jill Goodacre']
transcript: Would you like to call somebody?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Yeah, about 300 guys I went to high school with. Yeah, thanks.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Hello?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey, it's me.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: It's Chandler! Are you OK?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Yeah, I'm fine. I'm trppd in an ATM vstbl wth Jll Gdcr.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: What?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: I'm trppd... in an ATM vstbl... wth Jll Gdcr!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: I have no idea what you just said.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Put Joey on the phone.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: What's up man?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: I'm trppd... in an ATM vstbl... wth JLL GDCR.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Oh my God! He's trapped in an ATM vestibule with Jill Goodacre! Chandler, listen.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Yeah, like that thought never entered my mind.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Hmmm... this is so nice.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: OK, I have a question. Well, actually, it's not so much a question as.. more of a general wondering... ment.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: OK.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: OK. Here goes. For a while now, I've been wanting to, um....

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Ohhh!!!!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Yes, yes, that's right...

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh, look at the little cat!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: What? Ow!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani', 'Monica Geller', 'Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: I'm on top of the world, looking down on creation and the only explanation I can find, is the wonders I've found ever since...

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: This is just Bactine. It won't hurt.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Sorry, that was wax.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh, poor little Tooty is scared to death. We should find his owner.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Why don't we just put 'poor little Tooty' out in the hall?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: During a blackout? He'd get trampled!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Yeah?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh no, the Mendels, they hate all living things, right?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh. Hi. We just found this cat and we're looking for the owner.

speaker: ['Mr. Heckles']
transcript: Er, yeah, it's mine.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: He seems to hate you. Are you sure?

speaker: ['Mr. Heckles']
transcript: Yeah, it's my cat. Give me my cat.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Wait a minute. What's his name?

speaker: ['Mr. Heckles']
transcript: Ehhhh... B-Buttons.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Bob Buttons?

speaker: ['Mr. Heckles']
transcript: Mmm. Bob Buttons. Here, Bob Buttons.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oooh! You are a very bad man!

speaker: ['Mr. Heckles']
transcript: You owe me a cat.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Lucky sixes....

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Everybody, this is Paolo. Paolo, I want you to meet my friends. This is Monica.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Hi!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: And Joey....

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Hi!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: And Ross.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Hi!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: He doesn't speak much English.

speaker: ['Paolo']
transcript: Monopoly!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Look at that!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: So, um... where did Paolo come from?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh... Italy, I think.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: No, I mean tonight, in the building. Suddenly. Into our lives.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Well, the cat... the cat turned out to be Paolo's cat!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: That, that is funny... .... and Rachel keeps touching him.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Alright. I looked all over the building and I couldn't find the kitty anywhere.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh, I found him. He was Paolo's cat.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Ah! Well! There you go! Last to know again! And I'm guessing... since nobody told me... this is Paolo.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Ah, Paolo, this is Phoebe.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: You betcha!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Ah, let's see. What next? Blow a bubble. A bubble's good. It's got a... boyish charm, it's impish. Here we go.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Nice going, imp. OK, it's OK. All I need to do is reach over and put it in my mouth.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Good save! We're back on track, and I'm... ..chewing someone else's gum. This is not my gum. Oh my God! Oh my God! And now you're choking.

speaker: ['Jill Goodacre']
transcript: Are you alright?

speaker: ['Jill Goodacre']
transcript: My God, you're choking! That better?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Yes... thank you. That was... that was....

speaker: ['Jill Goodacre']
transcript: Perfection?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh, look look look. The last candle's about to burn out. 10, 9, 8, 7... ... negative 46, negative 47, negative 48....

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Thank you.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Thanks.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Kinda... spooky without any lights.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Bwah-hah-hah!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: OK, guys, guys? I have the definitive one. Mwwwooooo-hah-hah...

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Oh.. oh... oh.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Hey Ross. This probably isn't the best time to bring it up, but you have to throw a party for Monica.
